text:
...
Did something happen during the lesson?

... I wouldn't quite ay we had a fight,
maybe you could say we had a difference of options?

──... if the 3 of you can mesh together,
I'm sure you'll make an amazing unit.

Because I believe that,
I'll do whatever is neccessary.

...So if there's anything I can do,
tell me without holding back.

That's exactly why I'm making you listen to me complain like this
as a way to vent off the stress I'm getting from being around them.
It's really helping me out, Producer.
